description:
By taking this course you will have a powerful tool to not only help yourself, but you can also use it to create an income for yourself your earnings potential are limitless !

This course is designed to help you come into energetic balance and a state of bliss by relaxing, deep breathing and clearing the 7 main chakras in the body

You are a powerful energetic being, a spiritual being having a physical experience, everything and everyone you connect with impacts you energetically as you impact them. Reconnecting with this side of yourself is YOUR birthright.

By clearing your energy field through a purified chakra system you can expect to: -

  • Feel more alive !
  • Reduce stress levels
  • Be more alert
  • Sleep better
  • Feel more connected to those around you
  • Clear illnesses more quickly
  • Worry less
  • Reduce blood pressure
  • Be more creative
  • Feel less need to be in control
  • Be able to stand up for yourself
  • Be more in your heart
  • Be able to communicate more clearly
  • Open up dormant aspects of your psyche
  • Be more intuitive
  • Feel more at peace
  • Feel a total sense of universal connectedness and the wonders within.


What are you going to get from this course?

This is a certified course and you will receive your certificate on completion.

There are 3 hours of material with 36 videos, 2 quizzes and 3 bonus lectures and I am available as a guide throughout the course for any help you may need.

You will be able to run a chakra balancing healing on yourself as well as others, including children.

You will be able to run this healing on yourself as a personal tool, but you could also create an income for yourself by:
  • Running a weekly relaxation class in your area
  • Using it to offer workplaces a relaxation/meditation workshop
  • Offering it to schools as an extra-curricular activity.


The opportunities are endless, if you have some more ideas please let me know and I will add it to the list!

What will you need to take this course

A comfy place to relax

A pair of headphones

A general interest in your own well-being

Who can take this course ?

Anyone can take this course, all you need are ears !
title: Relax, Breathe,Come into Chakra Balance,your Path to Bliss
